summary: This is an email from FBI Special Agent Sean to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, requesting seats for three FBI officials (ADIC and SAC) to attend an Epstein-related hearing scheduled for the following day, August 27, 2019.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as an SSA (Supervisory Special Agent) on Squad C-20 (Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking) in FBI New York, requesting seats for a hearing.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing related to the Jeffrey Epstein case that FBI officials wished to attend.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 26, 2019, the day before a scheduled hearing in the Epstein case.
FBI officials from the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in New York sought to attend the hearing.
The request indicates high-level FBI interest (ADIC - Assistant Director in Charge, SAC - Special Agent in Charge) in the proceedings.
The document shows coordination between the FBI and the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the case.
The hearing occurred shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019, suggesting it was part of ongoing case proceedings.
